org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util
Class CubicGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util.CubicGenerator

public class CubicGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

A class to calculate the cubic spline curve based on input points.

Author:
Originally written by Tim Lambert (lambert\@cse.unsw.edu.au).

          The number of steps to break each curve into.

Method Detail

calcNaturalCubic

protected static Cubic[] calcNaturalCubic(int n,
                                          int[] x)
Calculates the natural cubic spline. It interpolates y[0], y[1], ... y[n] The first segment is returned as C[0].a + C[0].bu + C[0].cu^2 + C[0].du^3 where 0 lte u lt 1 the other segments are in C[1], C[2], ... C[n-1].

pointsInLine

public static boolean pointsInLine(java.awt.geom.Point2D[] pts)
Used to determine the points fall on a straight line. If the points fall on a straight straight line, then we don't want to calculate the cubic splines.

Parameters:
pts - Array of points to check if they fall on a straigt line.

getPoints

public static java.awt.geom.Point2D[] getPoints(java.awt.geom.Point2D[] points,
                                                int lineStyle)
Returns an array of points to draw a line, curved or otherwise. If the input points are on a straight line, then just return the input. If the points don't fall on a straight line, then calculate the cubic splines based on the input points and return a new array of points.

Parameters:
points - An array of points used to calculate line to draw.
ls - Indicates the line style of line to draw.

getListIndex

public static int getListIndex(java.awt.geom.Point2D pt,
                               java.awt.geom.Point2D[] drawPoints,
                               int lineStyle)
Finds the index of the given point. This method iterates over the list of points used to draw the curve/line and finds the one closest to the input point. Based on that index we figure out where in the list of curve input points (as opposed to drawing points) the point in question falls.

Parameters:
pt - The point to check.
